row.label: ${lbl:b_module}@{select smn_base.smn_modulos.smn_modulos_id as id, smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_codigo || ' - ' || smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_nombre as item from smn_base.smn_modulos order by smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_nombre}

${lbl:b_nature}@{select smn_base.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar_id as id, smn_base.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar.naa_codigo|| ' - ' || smn_base.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar.naa_nombre as item from smn_base.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar order by smn_base.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar.naa_nombre}

${lbl:b_module}@{select smn_base.smn_modulos.smn_modulos_id as id, smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_codigo || ' - ' || smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_nombre as item from smn_base.smn_modulos order by smn_base.smn_modulos.mod_nombre}

${lbl:b_nature}@{select smn_base.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar_id as id, smn_base.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar.naa_codigo|| ' - ' || smn_base.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar.naa_nombre as item from smn_base.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar order by smn_base.smn_naturaleza_auxiliar.naa_nombre}
